Contributor: Annison, Edward S., artist.; Liberty Loan Committee.;
Note: Signed "Edward S. Annison." Date based on America's participation in the war. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Design for a newspaper and magazine advertisement for a Liberty Loan campaign.  The text says that in order to keep the depots stored with war materials in France, think what you must do to keep supplies going over. Buy every bond you have the cash to pay for and then pledge to buy every one you can pay for in future installments. The illustration shows a supply ship being loaded.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I

Title: Keep up the supplies
